thread.title: BRIEF-Bill Barrett Corporation Receives All Required Stockholder Approvals Related To Business Combination With Fifth Creek Energy

title: BRIEF-Bill Barrett Corporation Receives All Required Stockholder Approvals Related To Business Combination With Fifth Creek Energy
text: March 16, 2018 / 4:55 PM / in 15 minutes BRIEF-Bill Barrett Corporation Receives All Required Stockholder Approvals Related To Business Combination With Fifth Creek Energy Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Bill Barrett Corp: * BILL BARRETT CORPORATION RECEIVES ALL REQUIRED STOCKHOLDER APPROVALS RELATED TO BUSINESS COMBINATION WITH FIFTH CREEK ENERGY * BILL BARRETT CORP - ‚ÄçFIFTH CREEK ENERGY TRANSACTION IS EXPECTED TO CLOSE MONDAY, MARCH 19 * BILL BARRETT CORP - ABOUT 98.7% PERCENT OF SHARES VOTING, VOTED IN FAVOR OF ADOPTION OF MERGER AGREEMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
